node.header_excerpt: The currency of the peer-to-peer internet, the ThreeFold Grid. Current value of TFT on ThreeFold Grid = $0.10

NEVER BEFORE WAS SECURITY SO ESSENTIAL. As the worlds population increasingly moves online amid a global pandemic, cyber attacks have rapidly surged as well. Both companies and individuals now face security risks that can no longer be ignored.
